mapper.select: SELECT SPRING_BOARD_TBL.SEQ, SPRING_BOARD_TBL.TITLE, SPRING_BOARD_TBL.WRITER, REGDATE, SPRING_BOARD_TBL.VIEWCNT, COUNT(SPRING_BOARD_TBL.SEQ) AS RCOUNT FROM SPRING_BOARD_TBL FULL JOIN SPRING_BOARD_REPLY_TBL ON SPRING_BOARD_TBL.seq = SPRING_BOARD_REPLY_TBL.seq GROUP BY SPRING_BOARD_TBL.seq, SPRING_BOARD_TBL.TITLE, SPRING_BOARD_TBL.WRITER, REGDATE, SPRING_BOARD_TBL.VIEWCNT ORDER BY SPRING_BOARD_TBL.seq DESC
INSERT INTO SPRING_BOARD_TBL (SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, VIEWCNT) VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ title }, #{ content }, #{ writer }, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)

SELECT SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'RRRR"년" MM"월" DD"일" MI"분" SS"초"') AS REGDATE, VIEWCNT FROM SPRING_BOARD_TBL
TITLE LIKE '%'||#{ keyword }||'%'
WRITER LIKE '%'||#{ keyword }||'%'
DELETE FROM SPRING_BOARD_TBL WHERE SEQ = #{ seq }
